definitions.definition: To squeeze through a ricer ; to mash or make into rice- sized pieces (especially potatoes ).
To harvest wild rice ( Zizania spp.)
To throw rice at a person (usually at a wedding).
To customize the user interface of a computer system, e.g. a desktop environment . (derived from rice out )

main_definition: ( transitive ) To squeeze through a ricer ; to mash or make into rice- sized pieces (especially potatoes ).
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To harvest wild rice ( Zizania spp.)
( rare ) To throw rice at a person (usually at a wedding).
( computing , transitive ) To customize the user interface of a computer system, e.g. a desktop environment . (derived from rice out )
